genresAdvancedInfo.name: mallet
genresAdvancedInfo.description: Mallet music is a genre that features the use of mallet instruments such as xylophones, marimbas, and vibraphones. It is often associated with jazz and classical music, but can also be found in contemporary and experimental compositions. The bright, percussive sound of mallet instruments adds a unique texture to the music, creating a playful and upbeat atmosphere.
